  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_521</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_521</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Inecuaciones</string>
            <string language="en">Inequalities</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschiedenheiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Inégalités</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desigualdades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diseguaglianze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανισότητες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las inecuaciones. Se estudian inecuaciones con una incógnita de primer y segundo grado y sistemas de inecuaciones de primer grado. Se utilizan técnicas analíticas y gráficas para analizar los ejemplos que se presentan.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which simulations to study inequalities, including linear and quadratic inequalities and systems of linear inequalities. The examples presented are analysed using analytical and graphical techniques.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primer grado</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">inecuación</string>
            <string language="en">inequality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistema</string>
            <string language="en">system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">segundo grado</string>
            <string language="en">quadratic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">desigualdad</string>
            <string language="en">inequation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welche Simulationen, 
zum von von Verschiedenheiten, einschließlich die linearen und 
quadratischen Verschiedenheiten und die Systeme der linearen 
Verschiedenheiten zu studieren. Die dargestellten Beispiele 
werden mit den analytischen und graphischen Techniken analysiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations pour 
étudier des inégalités, y compris des inégalités et des systèmes
linéaires et quadratiques des inégalités linéaires. Les 
exemples présentés sont analysés en utilisant des techniques 
analytiques et graphiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações para estudar 
desigualdades, including desigualdades e sistemas lineares e 
quadráticos de desigualdades lineares. Os exemplos apresentados
são analisados usando técnicas analíticas e gráficas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni per 
studiare le diseguaglianze, compreso le diseguaglianze ed i sistemi 
lineari e quadratici delle diseguaglianze lineari. Gli esempi 
presentati sono analizzati usando le tecniche analitiche e grafiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που προσομοιώσεις στις ανισότητες 
μελέτης, συμπεριλαμβανομένων των γραμμικών και δευτέρου βαθμού 
ανισοτήτων και των συστημάτων των γραμμικών ανισοτήτων. Τα 
παραδείγματα που παρουσιάζονται αναλύονται χρησιμοποιώντας τις 
αναλυτικές και γραφικές τεχνικές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verschiedenheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">quadratisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">inequation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">linéaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inégalité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
